text:
First, the dataset is split into train and test sets. We will call the train test split()
function to perform this split and pass in the pre-speciﬁed number of observations to use as the
test data. A model will be ﬁt once on the training dataset for a given conﬁguration. We will
deﬁne a generic model fit() function to perform this operation that can be ﬁlled in for the
given type of neural network that we may be interested in later. The function takes the training
